gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Dataset

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The OPERA Level 2 Radiometric Terrain Corrected (L2_RTC) product is derived from the original Copernicus Sentinel-1 (S1) A/B SLC data, with a temporal product sampling coincident with the availability of Sentinel-1 A/B SLC data. Each OPERA RTC product corresponds to a single Copernicus S1 A/B burst.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: File an issue or provide feedback
File an issue or provide feedback
File an issue or provide feedback

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: Data product generated in HDF5 format with ISO 19115 conformant metadata.

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: Bounding box of the product, in order of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax
CEOS Analysis Ready Data Document Identifier
CEOS Analysis Ready Data Product Type
Look direction can be left or right
Orbit direction can be ascending or descending
Azimuth start time of the product
Azimuth stop time of the product
Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product
Flag to indicate radar geometry or geocoded product

Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system
Product specification version which represents the schema of this product
Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines
Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels
Flag to indicate if Bi-static Delay correction was applied
Flag to indicate if the Static Tropospheric Geolocation correction was applied
Flag to indicate if filtering was applied
Flag to indicate if Pre Processing Multilooking was applied
Flag to indicate if the Wet Tropospheric Geolocation Correction was applied

eos:value.gco:CharacterString: Area-Based SAR Geocoding with Adaptive Multilooking (GEO-AP)

Gustavo H. X. Shiroma, Marco Lavalle, and Sean M. Buckley, "An Area-Based Projection Algorithm for SAR Radiometric Terrain Correction and Geocoding," in IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, vol. 60, pp. 1-23, 2022, Art no. 5222723, doi: 10.1109/TGRS.2022.3147472.

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: Radiometric terrain correction algorithm reference document

eos:value.gco:CharacterString: Gustavo H. X. Shiroma, Marco Lavalle, and Sean M. Buckley, "An Area-Based Projection Algorithm for SAR Radiometric Terrain Correction and Geocoding," in IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, vol. 60, pp. 1-23, 2022, Art no. 5222723, doi: 10.1109/TGRS.2022.3147472.

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: List of input L1 SLC products used
List of input orbit files used
List of input annotation files used
Source description for the utilized DEM file

eos:value.gco:CharacterString: Digital Elevation Model (DEM) for the NASA OPERA project version 1.1 (v1.1) based on the Copernicus DEM 30-m and Copernicus 90-m referenced to the WGS84 ellipsoid

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: Reference epoch in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSS

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: OPERA L2 RTC product generated by ASF using Sentinel-1 input data and SAS version 1.0.1 via HyP3 OPERA-RTC v1.0.0
